imdb.plot outline: Showcasing the work of independent filmmakers based in Iowa, each hour-long episode is a collection of short films that represents a wide range of artistic visions and forms - documentary, experimental, narrative, animation - all locally produced. Explore film as an art form and become acquainted with Iowa's vibrant film communities. These short films were selected from dozens of entries by representatives of Iowa Public Television, Produce Iowa and Iowa Arts Council.
imdb.title: The Film Lounge
